text: this is a security housing unit known as

else but up here on the wall is an air

those who are on their own in one of

well they still have interaction with

visions envision solitary confinement is
as I've always seen it in the movies and
stuff like that you know it's like some
deep dark hole where they put these guys
and they're totally by themselves with
no interaction with anybody and that's
just not not correct there's regular
interaction with other staff the
officers come by they hand me my food in

bring my dinner I say thank you they go
away and that's basically that or from
coming out for a shower or yard or
medical and that's basically pretty much
contact my name is fancy school I've got
on time and my prison number is f0 5026
I've been incarcerated and I've
convicted for bank robbery and I've been
incarcerated now for 12 years I have a
long history of being in this type of
setting so over those years during that
time my mental health is deteriorating
isolation breeds hostility you know and
if you experience what I've experienced
in the other prisons before then this
one right here is it's it's like

I've been in this shoe for about a year
already like most people that have been
in the shoe that can handle it know how
to program but some people just don't
they don't have that mentality I stay
busy I like I I read a lot you know so
I'll i'll stick with a lot of reading a
little bit of drawing and so forth you
know i just changed my activities i just
i just maintain it really just try to

does make you angry it it's like a dog
you put a dog in a cage and you keep him
away from people and you release that

dangerous to be out there with the other

they may be a security threat themselves
to where they may be haunted throughout
with the other day do you think it's

in this way I believe that there are

and they need to be segregated away from
